region.description: the region you want to deploy your app to

account.name: account
account.description: temporarily switch to a different account

ip.name: ip
ip.description: ip value for record A and AAAA

host.name: host
host.description: host value for record ALIAS and CNAME

mx.name: mx
mx.description: host and priority values for MX record. mx flag should be like this: --mx <hostname>,<priority>

srv.name: srv
srv.description: hostname, port, priority and weight values for SRV record. srv flag should be like this: <hostname>,<port>,<priority>,<weight>
